GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON object describing all available API endpoints

GET /api/topics.description: Retrieves an array of all available topics

GET /api/articles.description: Retrieves an array of all articles sorted by date in descending order

GET /api/users.description: Retrieves an array of all registered users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Retrieves a single article by its article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to the specified article by article_id

requestBody.username: The username of the comment's author

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote count of the specified article by article_id

requestBody.inc_votes: An integer indicating how much to increment or decrement the article's current vote count
